description.zh-cn: 东汉末期人物，曾任豫章太守，是诸葛亮的叔父。在兄长诸葛珪早逝后，他负责抚养诸葛亮、诸葛均等侄儿侄女。
description.en: A figure from the late Eastern Han dynasty who served as the Grand Administrator of Yuzhang. He was the uncle of Zhuge Liang and raised him and his siblings after their father, Zhuge Gui, passed away early.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，曾任泰山郡丞。他是诸葛玄的兄长，诸葛瑾、诸葛亮、诸葛均的父亲。
description.en: An official in the late Eastern Han dynasty, serving as the Assistant Administrator of Taishan Commandery. He was the elder brother of Zhuge Xuan and the father of Zhuge Jin, Zhuge Liang, and Zhuge Jun.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉丞相，中国历史上著名的政治家、军事家。诸葛玄的侄子。
description.en: Chancellor of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, a renowned statesman and military strategist in Chinese history. He was the nephew of Zhuge Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉官吏，官至长水校尉。诸葛玄的侄子，诸葛亮的弟弟。
description.en: An official of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, who served as Captain of Changshui. He was the nephew of Zhuge Xuan and the younger brother of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的军阀，曾推举诸葛玄为豫章太守。
description.en: A warlord during the late Eastern Han dynasty who appointed Zhuge Xuan as the Grand Administrator of Yuzhang.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的荆州牧，与诸葛玄有旧交。诸葛玄后来投靠于他。
description.en: The Governor of Jing Province during the late Eastern Han dynasty and an old acquaintance of Zhuge Xuan. Zhuge Xuan later sought refuge with him.

description.zh-cn: 东汉官员，由朝廷任命接替诸葛玄担任豫章太守。
description.en: An Eastern Han official appointed by the imperial court to replace Zhuge Xuan as the Grand Administrator of Yuzhang.

description.zh-cn: 东汉豫章太守，诸葛玄的前任。
description.en: Grand Administrator of Yuzhang during the Eastern Han dynasty, predecessor of Zhuge Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 以东汉琅邪郡为郡望的著名士族。
description.en: A prominent aristocratic clan from Langya Commandery during the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉时期琅邪郡下辖的县，是诸葛玄的籍贯所在地，位于今山东省沂南县。
description.en: A county under Langya Commandery during the Eastern Han dynasty, the ancestral home of Zhuge Xuan, located in modern-day Yinan County, Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 史书，记载了与《三国志》不同的关于诸葛玄结局的说法。
description.en: A historical text that records a different account of Zhuge Xuan's fate compared to the Records of the Three Kingdoms.

description.zh-cn: 东汉扬州刺史。根据《献帝春秋》记载，他曾出兵协助朱皓攻击诸葛玄。
description.en: Inspector of Yang Province during the Eastern Han dynasty. According to the Annals of Emperor Xian, he dispatched troops to assist Zhu Hao in attacking Zhuge Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 南朝宋史学家，为《三国志》作注，他认为《献帝春秋》中关于诸葛玄的记载不可信。
description.en: A historian of the Liu Song dynasty who annotated the Records of the Three Kingdoms. He considered the account of Zhuge Xuan in the Annals of Emperor Xian to be unreliable.

description.zh-cn: 西汉官员，汉元帝时任司隶校尉，是琅邪诸葛氏的先祖。
description.en: An official of the Western Han dynasty who served as Colonel-Director of Retainers under Emperor Yuan. He was an ancestor of the Zhuge clan of Langya.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期东吴重臣，官至大将军。诸葛玄的侄子，诸葛亮的兄长。
description.en: A key minister of Eastern Wu during the Three Kingdoms period, who served as Grand Marshal. He was the nephew of Zhuge Xuan and the elder brother of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 襄阳名士，娶诸葛玄的侄女为妻。
description.en: A famed scholar from Xiangyang who married one of Zhuge Xuan's nieces.

description.zh-cn: 襄阳望族子弟，娶诸葛玄的侄女为妻。
description.en: A scion of a prominent clan in Xiangyang who married one of Zhuge Xuan's nieces.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，诸葛玄在此期间担任官职。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, during which Zhuge Xuan held official posts.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛珪是诸葛玄的兄长。
description.en: Zhuge Gui was Zhuge Xuan's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛亮是诸葛珪的儿子。
description.en: Zhuge Liang was the son of Zhuge Gui.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛均是诸葛珪的儿子。
description.en: Zhuge Jun was the son of Zhuge Gui.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛瑾是诸葛珪的儿子。
description.en: Zhuge Jin was the son of Zhuge Gui.

description.zh-cn: 在父亲诸葛珪早逝后，诸葛亮由其叔父诸葛玄抚养，并随他躲避战乱。
description.en: After his father Zhuge Gui's early death, Zhuge Liang was raised by his uncle Zhuge Xuan and followed him to escape the chaos of war.

description.zh-cn: 在父亲诸葛珪早逝后，诸葛均由其叔父诸葛玄抚养，并随他躲避战乱。
description.en: After his father Zhuge Gui's early death, Zhuge Jun was raised by his uncle Zhuge Xuan and followed him to escape the chaos of war.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛玄受袁术推举为豫章太守。
description.en: Zhuge Xuan was appointed as the Grand Administrator of Yuzhang by Yuan Shu.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛玄的豫章太守职位后来被东汉朝廷任命的朱皓所取代。
description.en: Zhuge Xuan's position as Grand Administrator of Yuzhang was later replaced by Zhu Hao, who was appointed by the Eastern Han court.

description.zh-cn: 在失去豫章太守职位后，诸葛玄带领侄儿们前往襄阳投靠故交刘表。
description.en: After losing his position as Grand Administrator of Yuzhang, Zhuge Xuan took his nephews to Xiangyang to seek refuge with his old acquaintance Liu Biao.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛玄与荆州牧刘表素有旧交。
description.en: Zhuge Xuan had a long-standing friendship with Liu Biao, the Governor of Jing Province.

description.zh-cn: 根据《献帝春秋》的记载，刘繇曾应朱皓请求出兵，共同攻击诸葛玄。此记载的真实性存疑。
description.en: According to the Annals of Emperor Xian, Liu Yao dispatched troops at Zhu Hao's request to jointly attack Zhuge Xuan. The authenticity of this record is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛玄是琅邪诸葛氏的成员。
description.en: Zhuge Xuan was a member of the Zhuge clan of Langya.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛玄的籍贯为琅邪郡阳都县。
description.en: Zhuge Xuan's ancestral home was Yangdu County, Langya Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛丰是诸葛玄的先祖。
description.en: Zhuge Feng was an ancestor of Zhuge Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 裴松之在为《三国志》作注时，认为《献帝春秋》的记述悖离正史，不可尽信。
description.en: When annotating the Records of the Three Kingdoms, Pei Songzhi argued that the accounts in the Annals of Emperor Xian deviated from orthodox history and were not entirely credible.

description.zh-cn: 庞山民是诸葛玄的侄女婿。
description.en: Pang Shanmin was Zhuge Xuan's nephew-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 蒯祺是诸葛玄的侄女婿。
description.en: Kuai Qi was Zhuge Xuan's nephew-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛玄曾担任东汉的豫章太守。
description.en: Zhuge Xuan served as the Grand Administrator of Yuzhang for the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 诸葛玄在周术病亡后，接替其豫章太守的职位。
description.en: After Zhou Shu died of illness, Zhuge Xuan succeeded him as the Grand Administrator of Yuzhang.
